file.name: negative2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                foo:
                  value:
                    versions:
                    - status: CURRENT
                      updated: '2011-01-21T11:33:21Z'
                      id: v2.0
                      links:
                      - href: http://127.0.0.1:8774/v2/
                        rel: self
security:
- exampleSecurity: []
components:
  exampleSecurity:
    type: http
    scheme: basic

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /: get: operation "listVersionsv2": security: unknown security schema "exampleSecurity"
